1. First, create a Summary Variable to represent twice the quantity of ProductZ across all quote lines.
2. Create a Price Rule that will specify that it will be evaluated on the Quote Line Editor and for calculation events
3. Create a Price Condition that makes the rule evaluate only when the quote line product code is ProductX.
4. Create a Price Action that will set the quote line Quantity field to the value of the composite summary variable.
